programs.name: Air India Maharaja Club
programs.summary: Maharaja Club is the largest frequent flyer programme in the Indian skies. Earn points every time you fly with Air India or any of their 24 Star Alliance Partners.
programs.seoDescription: Learn how Air India’s Maharaja Club works, from earning and retaining Maharaja points to tier benefits like free seat selection, lounge access, upgrade vouchers and flexible cash + points bookings across Air India and Star Alliance flights.

sections.title: Program essentials
sections.intro: Key facts to get started with Air India’s Maharaja Club.

items.label: Earning basis
items.value: 6–10 Maharaja Points per ₹100 spent on base fare + fuel surcharge; 6 Tier Points/₹100 on Air India flights

images.alt: Air India aircraft with Maharaja Club emblem against an Indian skyline
images.caption: Maharaja Club treats loyal flyers to royal perks across Air India’s hubs.

blocks.text: Members earn two types of points: Maharaja Points, which can be redeemed for award travel or cabin upgrades, and Tier Points, which determine your status level. Earnings accumulate whenever you fly Air India or Star Alliance partners, book via the website/app, shop with over 50 non‑airline partners or use co‑branded credit cards. Booking directly on airindia.com or the Air India app yields an extra 2 Maharaja Points per ₹100 on eligible flights.

blocks.title: Eligible flight activity
items: Air India‑operated flights booked with cash or Cash + Points (no points earned on reward tickets).
Flights operated by Star Alliance partners when crediting to your Maharaja account.
Partner flights do not earn Tier Points on a one‑to‑one basis; instead you earn 1 Tier Point for every 2 Maharaja Points.

blocks.text: Maharaja Points normally expire after 24 months, but the expiry of your entire balance is extended by another 24 months whenever you take a paid Air India flight (does not apply to award tickets). This means points never expire for ‘active’ members who fly at least once every two years.

sections.title: Maharaja Club tier breakdown
sections.intro: Four elite tiers unlock progressively richer earnings, upgrade vouchers, fee waivers and status perks.

table.caption: Air India Maharaja Club tiers at a glance

cells: Red (Entry)
Automatic on enrollment
No annual qualification required
6 Maharaja Points / ₹100 + 6 Tier Points / ₹100; +2 points/₹100 when booking on airindia.com or app
1,000‑point enrolment bonus after your first paid Air India flight · Earn and redeem on Air India & Star Alliance flights · Access to Family Pool for pooling points with up to 9 members
Silver
15,000 Tier Points (incl. 4,500 on Air India) OR 30 flights with 4 Air India flights in 12 months
15,000 Tier Points (4,500 AI) OR 30 flights with 4 AI flights each membership year
8 Maharaja Points / ₹100 + 6 Tier Points / ₹100; +2 points/₹100 for direct bookings

Priority Connect helpline for booking/itinerary changes · Flat fee (≈₹1,180) for one domestic itinerary change up to 24 hours before departure · 1 cabin upgrade voucher valid 6 months · Complimentary 5 kg extra baggage allowance on Air India flights · Priority check‑in, waitlist clearance and boarding services
Gold
30,000 Tier Points (incl. 9,000 on Air India) OR 60 flights with 8 Air India flights in 12 months
30,000 Tier Points (9,000 AI) OR 60 flights with 8 AI flights each year
9 Maharaja Points / ₹100 + 6 Tier Points / ₹100; +2 points/₹100 for direct bookings

Free itinerary change (1x) up to 24h before departure on domestic flights and up to 72h on international flights · 2 cabin upgrade vouchers valid 9 months · Fee waiver for domestic flight cancellation up to 24h (INR 1,199 + GST) · Complimentary standard seat selection · Fly Prior service (switch to an earlier domestic flight within 12h) · Lounge access with one guest and excess baggage allowance of 20 kg or 1 piece up to 23 kg on AI/Star Alliance flights · Priority check‑in, boarding and waitlist clearance
Platinum
45,000 Tier Points (incl. 13,500 on Air India) OR 90 flights with 12 Air India flights in 12 months
45,000 Tier Points (13,500 AI) OR 90 flights with 12 AI flights each year
10 Maharaja Points / ₹100 + 6 Tier Points / ₹100; +2 points/₹100 for direct bookings

Two free itinerary changes per ticket on domestic and international flights · 3 cabin upgrade vouchers valid 12 months · Domestic cancellation fee waiver up to 24h before departure · Complimentary seat selection on all seats, including exit‑row and bulkhead · Fly Prior and priority services · Excess baggage allowance of 20 kg or 1 extra piece (Air India & Star Alliance) · Lounge access with a guest

blocks.text: Maharaja Club monitors your Tier Points and eligible flights across the past 365 days. You can move up a tier by meeting the required Tier Points or flight count, and you must meet the same threshold each year to retain your status. Upgrades are processed automatically as soon as the qualifying threshold is reached, and your membership year resets on the date of tier upgrade.

items: Tier Points are earned only on Air India flights (6 Tier Points per ₹100) and on partner flights at 1 Tier Point per 2 Maharaja Points.
Status evaluations happen continuously; once your Tier Points or flight count crosses the threshold, your account is upgraded automatically.
Retention requires meeting the same Tier Points or flight count in the following membership year; otherwise, your status will be downgraded.
Points cannot be used to buy status; only earning flights and partner activities qualify for Tier Points.

sections.title: Discounts & perks
sections.intro: Tier‑based benefits range from basic priority services to generous fee waivers and lounge access.
bullets: Priority Connect hotline gives Silver, Gold and Platinum members fast access to customer support for bookings, ticket changes and account issues.
Fee waivers for itinerary changes scale with your tier — a discounted change fee for Silver, free domestic/international changes for Gold and multiple free changes for Platinum.
Cabin upgrade vouchers (1–3 per year depending on tier) allow domestic cabin upgrades subject to seat availability.
Complimentary extra baggage: Silver members receive +5 kg on Air India flights; Gold and Platinum receive +20 kg or one extra 23‑kg piece on Air India and Star Alliance flights.
Lounge access for Gold and Platinum members, including one guest, at Air India and Star Alliance lounges.
Fly Prior service lets Gold and Platinum members travel on an earlier domestic flight within 12 hours of their original departure (same route, cabin and day) without fees.

blocks.text: Maharaja Club does not issue generic lounge passes like some programmes, but members receive upgrade vouchers and can share points through family pooling.

items: Cabin upgrade vouchers are awarded on tier upgrade/renewal: 1 for Silver (valid 6 months), 2 for Gold (valid 9 months) and 3 for Platinum (valid 12 months), usable on domestic flights subject to availability.
Family Pool feature lets you add up to nine family members and choose how much of their earning is pooled (100%, 75% or 50%). Pooling simplifies award redemptions by combining points in one account.
Cash + Points booking allows you to pay part of a ticket in cash and part in points, helpful when your balance is low.
You can buy Maharaja Points for ₹1.50 each to top up your balance when needed; purchased points carry a 24‑month validity.

sections.title: Points policy essentials
sections.intro: Understand the rules governing your Maharaja Points and Tier Points.
bullets: Maharaja Points have a default 24‑month validity but never expire for active members — each paid Air India flight resets the expiry of your entire balance for another 24 months.
Tier Points count toward status but cannot be redeemed. Tier Points expire on a rolling 365‑day basis and determine your tier level.
You earn 6 Tier Points per ₹100 spent on Air India (base fare + fuel surcharge) across all tiers and 1 Tier Point per 2 Maharaja Points on Star Alliance partner flights.
No points are awarded on codeshare or interline flights or on award tickets.
Claim missing points up to 12 months after Air India travel or within six to twelve months for Star Alliance partners, depending on the airline.
Purchases from non‑airline partners and co‑branded credit cards earn Maharaja Points but not Tier Points.
Maharaja Points can be transferred from select bank credit cards; transfer ratios vary by issuer.

programs.name: IndiGo BluChip
programs.summary: BluChip makes IndiGo flights more rewarding. Earn BluChips each time you fly, get extra points for booking on the app or website, and enjoy discounts on add-ons like seat selection and Fast Forward
programs.seoDescription: Understand IndiGo BluChip earning, tier shortcuts, and 6E Prime perks with a flexible guide to India's largest low-cost carrier loyalty program.

sections.title: Program essentials
sections.intro: Key facts to get started with IndiGo BluChip.

images.alt: IndiGo aircraft against an India skyline
images.caption: BluChip keeps frequent India flyers engaged across 6E hubs.

blocks.text: IndiGo BluChip rewards members for every eligible rupee spent with IndiGo and select partners, layering base earnings with tier and channel bonuses.

blocks.title: Ways to earn BluChips
items: 8 BluChips per ₹100 on base fare and fuel surcharge across IndiGo and eligible codeshare flights.
Extra BluChips when booking on the IndiGo website or mobile app via channel bonuses.
Earn on prepaid add-ons such as Seat Select, Excess Baggage, and Fast Forward.

blocks.title: Eligible flight activity
items: 6E marketed and operated flights
6E marketed flights operated by codeshare partners

blocks.text: BluChips stay valid with any earn or redeem activity at least once every 24 months.

sections.title: BluChip tier breakdown
sections.intro: Three elite tiers unlock progressively richer bonuses, 6E Prime passes, and discounts on IndiGo's most popular add-ons.

table.caption: IndiGo BluChip elite tiers at a glance

cells: Blu 3 (Entry)
Automatic enrollment
No expiry
8 BluChips / ₹100 base earn + 4 BluChips / ₹100 channel bonus
10% Seat Select, Excess Baggage, Fast Forward discounts · 0 6E Prime passes · Nominees: 5
Blu 2
₹1,00,000 IndiGo spend + 4 IndiGo flights (12 months)
₹1,00,000 spend + 4 flights annually
8 BluChips / ₹100 base + 2 BluChips / ₹100 tier bonus
20% add-on discounts · 20 6E Prime passes · Nominees: 5
Blu 1
₹2,00,000 IndiGo spend + 8 IndiGo flights (12 months)
₹2,00,000 spend + 8 flights annually
8 BluChips / ₹100 base + 4 BluChips / ₹100 tier bonus
30% add-on discounts · 40 6E Prime passes · Nominees: 5

blocks.text: IndiGo reviews your spend and flight activity daily for upgrades while retention is measured across the last 365 days.

items: Upgrade evaluations happen in near real time once thresholds are crossed.
Annual retention looks back 365 days for both spend and flight requirements.
Only base fare and fuel surcharge qualify toward BluChip earnings and thresholds.
Pre-booked add-ons earn at the tier-adjusted bonus rate.

sections.title: Discounts & perks
sections.intro: BluChip tiers unlock deeper savings on IndiGo's most popular extras.
bullets: Seat selection savings apply only on pre-booked selections across the fleet.
Discounted Excess Baggage and Fast Forward services scale from 10% to 30% depending on tier.
6E Prime passes bundle Fast Forward, seat selection, and meals for frequent travelers.

blocks.text: 6E Prime passes provide bundles of priority services you can redeem or share with nominees.

items: Redeem 6E Prime passes for Fast Forward, preferred seating, and meal combos depending on your tier allotment.
Nominees enjoy the same discounted add-on pricing, making family travel cheaper.
Manage nominee access directly in your BluChip dashboard.

sections.title: Points policy essentials
sections.intro: Understand the rules that keep your BluChips active and flexible.
bullets: BluChips do not expire as long as you record activity at least once every 24 months.
All earn calculations follow Base + Tier Bonus + Channel Bonus for clear tracking.
Monitor the activity log in your account to confirm credits from flights and add-ons.

programs.name: Emirates Skywards
programs.summary: Emirates Skywards is the frequent‑flyer programme for Emirates and flydubai. Members earn Skywards Miles and separate Tier Miles on paid flights and through credit cards, hotels and retail partners. Tier Miles unlock higher status levels, while Skywards Miles can be redeemed for flights, upgrades and other rewards across Emirates’ global network.
programs.seoDescription: Discover how Emirates Skywards works: earn Skywards Miles and Tier Miles on Emirates and flydubai flights, climb through Blue, Silver, Gold and Platinum status, and enjoy bonus miles, lounge access, extra baggage, priority services and exclusive perks.

sections.title: Program essentials
sections.intro: Key facts to get started with Emirates Skywards.

items.label: Earn currency
items.value: Skywards Miles (reward miles) & Tier Miles (status miles)

items.label: Earning basis
items.value: Miles earned based on fare paid, route and cabin class; Tier Miles accrue at the same rate as Skywards Miles on Emirates, flydubai and Emirates‑marketed flights

blocks.text: Members earn two types of currency: Skywards Miles, which can be redeemed for reward flights, upgrades, hotel stays and other experiences, and Tier Miles, which determine your status level. Skywards Miles and Tier Miles accrue when you fly with Emirates or flydubai, book through Emirates‑marketed codeshare flights, or spend with hundreds of partners such as hotels, car hire companies and co‑branded credit cards.

blocks.title: Ways to earn Miles
items: Paid flights operated by Emirates or flydubai, including Cash + Miles tickets (no miles earned on award tickets).
Emirates‑marketed flights operated by partner airlines – these earn Skywards Miles and Tier Miles at the same rates as Emirates flights.
Spend with non‑airline partners such as hotels, car rentals, shopping portals and co‑branded credit cards (these only earn Skywards Miles, not Tier Miles).

blocks.text: Your tier is based on the Tier Miles or qualifying flights you earn during a rolling 12‑month period. Silver status requires 25,000 Tier Miles or 25 qualifying flights, Gold requires 50,000 Tier Miles or 50 flights, and Platinum requires 150,000 Tier Miles plus at least one qualifying Business or First Class flight. Tier status is valid for 14 months and you must meet the same requirements during the subsequent membership year to retain your level.

Skywards Miles remain valid for three years and expire at the end of the month of your birth in the calendar year they are due to expire. Expiry dates are not extended by account activity, however, miles do not expire for Platinum members and holders of co‑branded Emirates credit cards.

sections.title: Skywards tier breakdown
sections.intro: Four status tiers unlock progressively richer mileage bonuses, lounge privileges, seat selection and baggage benefits.

table.caption: Emirates Skywards tiers at a glance

cells: Blue (Entry)
Automatic on enrolment
N/A
Earn Skywards Miles according to fare, route and cabin; no mileage bonus
Access to Cash + Miles redemptions · Ability to upgrade at check‑in or onboard using miles · Complimentary unlimited Wi‑Fi when travelling in Business or First Class · Basic waitlist priority
Silver
25,000 Tier Miles or 25 qualifying flights in a 12‑month period
25,000 Tier Miles or 25 flights each membership year
30% bonus Miles on Emirates and flydubai flights
Complimentary access to the Emirates Business Class lounge in Dubai for the member · Extra checked baggage allowance · Priority check‑in and boarding · Higher waitlist priority
Gold
50,000 Tier Miles or 50 qualifying flights in a 12‑month period
50,000 Tier Miles or 50 flights each membership year
75% bonus Miles on Emirates and flydubai flights

Free Economy seat selection for the member and companions · Complimentary lounge access worldwide for the member and one guest · Guaranteed Economy Class seat when flights are sold out · Priority services and baggage delivery
Platinum
150,000 Tier Miles and at least one qualifying Business or First Class flight in a 12‑month period
150,000 Tier Miles and 1 qualifying flight each membership year
100% bonus Miles on Emirates and flydubai flights

First Class check‑in and baggage delivery · Home check‑in service in Dubai · Worldwide First Class lounge access for the member and guests · Ability to gift one Gold membership · Highest priority services and baggage handling

blocks.text: Tier Miles are awarded only on flights operated by Emirates or flydubai, and on Emirates‑marketed codeshare flights. Tier Miles match the number of Skywards Miles earned on those flights and cannot be earned through partners or non‑flight transactions.

items: Status evaluations are continuous; once your Tier Miles or flight count crosses the threshold, your status is upgraded and a new 12‑month membership year begins.
To retain your status, you must meet the same Tier Mile or flight threshold during the following membership year; otherwise, you will be downgraded one tier.
A qualifying flight for Platinum must be in Business or First Class on Emirates or flydubai.
Tier Miles reset to zero at the start of each membership year.

sections.title: Discounts & perks
sections.intro: Skywards status comes with mileage bonuses, priority services and valuable travel benefits.
bullets: Mileage bonuses: Silver members earn 30% bonus Miles, Gold 75% and Platinum 100% on Emirates and flydubai flights.
Seat selection and upgrades: Gold and Platinum members can select complimentary Economy seats for themselves and companions; upgrades using Miles are available at check‑in and on board.
Lounge access: Silver members enjoy Business Class lounge access in Dubai; Gold and Platinum members receive worldwide lounge access with guest privileges.
Priority services: Elites enjoy priority check‑in, boarding and baggage handling, as well as guaranteed Economy seats (Gold and above) and access to dedicated service hotlines.
Extra baggage: Silver, Gold and Platinum members receive additional checked baggage allowance on Emirates flights.
Complimentary Wi‑Fi: All members travelling in Business or First Class enjoy unlimited Wi‑Fi; selected co‑branded credit card holders and Platinum members enjoy free Wi‑Fi in all cabins.

blocks.text: Higher tiers come with passes and benefits that extend beyond your own travel.

items: Gold and Platinum members can invite one or more guests into Emirates and partner lounges worldwide (number of guests depends on lounge policy).
Platinum members may gift a Gold tier membership to one nominated spouse or companion during each membership year.
Members can pool Skywards Miles with family via the My Family account, allowing up to eight family members to combine earnings for faster redemptions.
Cash + Miles redemptions enable members to pay part of the fare in cash and part in Miles, increasing flexibility when your balance is low.

programs.name: Qatar Airways Privilege Club
programs.summary: Privilege Club is the loyalty programme of Qatar Airways. Members earn Avios on Qatar Airways, Oneworld carriers and partners, while Qpoints track elite status from Burgundy to Platinum. Higher tiers enjoy bonus Avios, lounge access, Qcredits for upgrades, extra baggage and priority services across Qatar’s growing network.
programs.seoDescription: Learn about Qatar Airways Privilege Club: earn Avios and Qpoints on flights and partners, qualify for Silver, Gold and Platinum status, and enjoy Qcredits, bonus Avios, lounge access and priority services.

sections.title: Program essentials
sections.intro: Key facts to get started with Qatar Airways Privilege Club.

items.label: Earning basis
items.value: Avios earned based on fare, cabin and distance; Qpoints earned per sector and cabin with at least 20% of Qpoints from Qatar Airways flights.

blocks.text: Privilege Club members earn Avios by flying Qatar Airways and Oneworld partner airlines, as well as through hotel stays, car rentals, shopping and co‑branded credit cards. Avios can be redeemed for award flights, upgrades, excess baggage and lifestyle rewards. Separate Qpoints measure your progress towards elite status and are awarded based on flight distance, cabin and booking class. at least 20% of your Qpoints must come from Qatar‑operated flights or you must fly at least 4 (within 12 months prior to retention) or 8 sectors (within 24 months prior to retention) on flights marketed and operated by Qatar Airways.

blocks.title: Ways to earn Avios and Qpoints
items: Flights marketed and operated by Qatar Airways, Oneworld airlines and select partners.
Everyday spend with partners including hotels, car rentals, shopping portals and co‑branded credit cards (these earn Avios but no Qpoints).
Promotions and points transfers from other Avios programmes (British Airways, Iberia Plus and Finnair).

blocks.text: Avios expire after 36 months of inactivity; any account activity (earning or redemption) extends the validity of your entire balance. Avios do not expire for Platinum members and can be reinstated for a fee if they lapse.

sections.title: Privilege Club tier breakdown
sections.intro: Four elite tiers unlock increasing Avios bonuses, lounge access, Qcredits and travel privileges.

table.caption: Qatar Airways Privilege Club tiers at a glance

cells: Burgundy (Entry)
Automatic on enrolment
N/A
Earn Avios at base rates; no tier bonus
Ability to pool Avios with family members via the Family Programme · Access to member offers and promotions · Earn and redeem on Qatar Airways and Oneworld partners
Silver
150 Qpoints in 12 months with at least 20% earned on Qatar Airways flights or four Qatar segments
135 Qpoints in 12 months or 270 Qpoints in 24 months with the same Qatar flights requirement
25% bonus Avios on Qatar Airways and Oneworld flights

Two complimentary lounge passes per membership year · Complimentary lounge access at Hamad International Airport when flying Qatar Airways · Priority check‑in, boarding and standby · Free extra baggage allowance (up to 15 kg or 1 piece) · 10% discount on excess baggage · Priority baggage handling
Gold
300 Qpoints in 12 months with at least 20% earned on Qatar Airways flights
270 Qpoints in 12 months or 540 Qpoints in 24 months with the same Qatar flights requirement
75% bonus Avios on Qatar Airways and Oneworld flights

Access to Qatar Airways and partner Business Class lounges for the member and one guest · Four additional lounge guest passes per year · Guaranteed Economy Class awards on sold‑out flights · 5% discount on Avios redemptions · Waived award fees for booking or changes · Preferred seats and priority seat selection · 40 Qcredits annually for upgrades or excess baggage · Additional baggage allowance (up to 25 kg or 2 pieces) and priority baggage delivery
Platinum
600 Qpoints in 12 months with at least 20% earned on Qatar Airways flights
540 Qpoints in 12 months or 1,080 Qpoints in 24 months with the same Qatar flights requirement
100% bonus Avios on Qatar Airways and Oneworld flights

First Class and Business Class lounge access with two guests (including Al Mourjan & Al Safwa lounges when flying on Qatar Airways) · Five guest lounge passes per year · Guaranteed Economy and Business Class seats on sold‑out flights · 60 Qcredits per year for upgrades or excess baggage · Priority services at every airport touchpoint and highest baggage allowance (up to 50 kg or two pieces) · Membership Avios never expire and Platinum members enjoy priority call handling

blocks.text: Beyond lounge access, Qatar Airways offers additional benefits and the ability to share rewards.

items: Qcredits can be used to upgrade a paid ticket to the next cabin or to pay for excess baggage; they are valid for two years and are awarded annually (40 for Gold, 60 for Platinum).
Family Programme allows you to add up to nine family members and pool Avios for faster redemptions; Avios earned by nominated members automatically credit to the head member’s account.

Silver members receive two single‑use lounge passes per membership year; Gold members receive four passes and Platinum members receive five passes to invite additional guests into Qatar Airways lounges.
Platinum members enjoy priority telephone assistance and can nominate one adult to receive Gold tier status for a year.

sections.title: Avios & Qpoints policy
sections.intro: Keep your Avios and Qpoints active by understanding expiry and transfer rules.
bullets: Avios expire after 36 consecutive months of inactivity; earning or redeeming any Avios resets the validity of your entire balance.
Platinum members’ Avios never expire; expired Avios can be reinstated for a fee within a limited period.
Qpoints expire at the end of your rolling 12‑ or 24‑month qualification period and cannot be extended, transferred or purchased.
Avios can be transferred between British Airways Executive Club, Iberia Plus, Aer Lingus AerClub and other Avios programmes, but Qpoints remain within Privilege Club.
No Avios or Qpoints are awarded on award tickets or upgrade awards.
Family members’ Avios pool into the head account, but Qpoints earned by family members remain in their own accounts and count toward their own status.

programs.name: Singapore Airlines KrisFlyer
programs.summary: KrisFlyer is the loyalty programme of Singapore Airlines and Scoot. Members earn KrisFlyer miles, Elite miles and PPS Value across flights and everyday spending. Elite miles unlock Silver and Gold status, while PPS Value unlocks the PPS Club and Solitaire PPS Club for premium cabin flyers. Higher tiers deliver bonus miles, lounge access, priority services and generous baggage allowances across the Star Alliance network.
programs.seoDescription: Understand Singapore Airlines’ KrisFlyer: earn miles on flights and partner spend, qualify for Elite Silver and Elite Gold tiers or the PPS Club, and enjoy lounge access, priority services and enhanced redemption value.

sections.title: Program essentials
sections.intro: Key facts to get started with KrisFlyer.

items.label: Earn currency
items.value: KrisFlyer miles (reward currency), Elite miles & PPS Value (status metrics)

items.label: Earning basis
items.value: Miles earned based on distance flown and booking class; Elite miles accrue at the same rate on Singapore Airlines and Star Alliance partners, while Scoot flights earn 2.5 Elite miles for every KrisFlyer mile. PPS Value accrues at 1 Singapore dollar spent on eligible Business or First Class fares and surcharges

items.label: Tiers
items.value: KrisFlyer • KrisFlyer Elite Silver • KrisFlyer Elite Gold • PPS Club • Solitaire PPS Club

blocks.text: KrisFlyer members earn KrisFlyer miles on flights with Singapore Airlines, Scoot, Star Alliance and other partner airlines. Miles can also be earned via co‑branded credit cards, hotels, dining and online shopping through Kris+, KrisShop and Pelago. KrisFlyer miles can be redeemed for award flights, flight upgrades and a range of lifestyle rewards.

blocks.title: Earning metrics
items: KrisFlyer miles accrue based on distance flown and booking class on Singapore Airlines and Star Alliance carriers; discounted fares earn fewer miles, while premium cabins earn up to 200% of flown distance.
Elite miles accrue on the same flights and determine your Elite Silver or Elite Gold status; Scoot flights earn 2.5 Elite miles per KrisFlyer mile.
PPS Value accrues only when flying Singapore Airlines or Scoot in Suites, First or Business Class at 1 PPS Value per Singapore dollar spent on airfare and eligible surcharges.

blocks.text: Elite tiers are achieved by earning Elite miles within a 12‑month period: Elite Silver requires 25,000 Elite miles and Elite Gold requires 50,000 Elite miles. PPS Club status requires 25,000 PPS Value and Solitaire PPS Club requires 50,000 PPS Value in a 12‑month period. Your membership year restarts on the date you qualify, and you must meet the same thresholds to retain your tier.

KrisFlyer miles expire 36 months after they are credited. You can extend expiring miles for a fee; however, miles never expire for PPS Club and Solitaire PPS Club members while they hold that status. Elite miles and PPS Value reset at the start of each membership year and cannot be transferred.

sections.title: KrisFlyer tier breakdown
sections.intro: KrisFlyer and PPS status levels unlock progressive mileage bonuses, seat privileges, baggage allowances, lounge access and priority services.

table.caption: Singapore Airlines KrisFlyer and PPS tiers at a glance

cells: KrisFlyer (Entry)
Automatic on enrolment
N/A
Earn KrisFlyer miles at base rates; no bonus
Redeem miles for flights, upgrades and lifestyle rewards · Access to KrisShop and Kris+ deals · Ability to create a Family Account to pool miles with up to five relatives
KrisFlyer Elite Silver
25,000 Elite miles in any consecutive 12‑month period
25,000 Elite miles each membership year
25% bonus KrisFlyer miles on Singapore Airlines and Scoot flights

Complimentary standard seat selection in Economy Class · Priority reservation waitlist and airport standby· Priority check‑in and boarding· Extra checked baggage allowance and Star Alliance Silver status
KrisFlyer Elite Gold
50,000 Elite miles in any consecutive 12‑month period
50,000 Elite miles each membership year
25% bonus KrisFlyer miles on Singapore Airlines and Scoot flights

Access to more than 1,000 Star Alliance and partner lounges worldwide for the member and one guest· Priority check‑in, boarding and baggage handling · Extra checked and cabin baggage allowances · Star Alliance Gold benefits including lounge access, extra baggage and priority services · All Elite Silver benefits
PPS Club
S$25,000 PPS Value from eligible Business or First Class fares and surcharges in a 12‑month period
S$25,000 PPS Value each membership year
25% bonus KrisFlyer miles on most paid fare classes

Access to SilverKris Business Class lounges worldwide for the member and a guest· Dedicated First Class and Business Class check‑in counters · Priority boarding and baggage delivery · Complimentary seat selection including forward Zone seats · Guaranteed Economy Class reservation on Singapore Airlines · Priority service hotline and enhanced baggage allowances
Solitaire PPS Club
S$50,000 PPS Value from eligible Business or First Class fares and surcharges in a 12‑month period
S$50,000 PPS Value each membership year
25% bonus KrisFlyer miles on most paid fare classes

First Class lounge access worldwide for the member and one guest· First Class check‑in, boarding and baggage delivery · Guaranteed reservations in Economy, Premium Economy and Business Class · Ability to gift a PPS Club supplementary membership to a spouse or nominated partner · Highest priority waitlisting and complimentary seat selection across all cabins

sections.title: Discounts & perks
sections.intro: KrisFlyer and PPS status unlock a variety of travel benefits.
bullets: Bonus miles: Elite Silver and Elite Gold members receive a 25% mileage bonus on Singapore Airlines and Scoot flights, while PPS members earn a 25% bonus on most paid fare classes.

Seat privileges: Elite Silver members receive complimentary standard seat selection in Economy, while Elite Gold and PPS members enjoy complimentary forward or Extra Legroom seat selection (depending on fare class).

Lounge access: Elite Gold members access Star Alliance lounges worldwide for themselves and one guest; PPS Club members access SilverKris Business Class lounges with a guest; Solitaire PPS members access First Class lounges for themselves and one guest.
Priority services: Elite and PPS members enjoy priority check‑in, boarding, baggage handling, security screening (where available) and priority waitlisting on sold‑out flights.

Extra baggage: Elite Silver members receive an additional checked baggage allowance; Elite Gold, PPS and Solitaire PPS members receive even greater allowances across Singapore Airlines, Scoot and Star Alliance airlines.
Waived or discounted service fees: Elite and PPS members may receive waived change fees, priority refund processing and access to dedicated call centres.
Wi‑Fi perks: PPS and Solitaire PPS members receive complimentary in‑flight Wi‑Fi in Suites, First and Business Class and discounted plans in other cabins.

blocks.text: Beyond status tiers, KrisFlyer offers milestone rewards and the ability to share benefits.

items: KrisFlyer Milestone Rewards grant bonus miles, flight upgrade certificates and lounge passes at specific Elite mile thresholds (e.g., 20,000, 40,000 and 60,000 Elite miles).
PPS Club and Solitaire PPS Club members may gift a PPS Club supplementary membership to a spouse or nominated partner, conferring lounge access and priority services.
Members can create a KrisFlyer Family Account to pool miles across up to five family members for faster redemptions.
Elite and PPS members receive special offers through KrisShop, KrisFlyer Spontaneous Escapes and partner promotions.

programs.name: Cathay membership
programs.summary: Cathay membership is the loyalty programme of Cathay Pacific, rewarding members with Asia Miles and Status Points. Members start at Green and can progress through Silver, Gold and Diamond tiers by earning Status Points on flights and everyday spend. Higher tiers provide lounge access, priority check‑in, extra baggage, guaranteed seats and other exclusive privileges.
programs.seoDescription: Explore Cathay’s loyalty programme: earn Asia Miles and Status Points, climb from Green to Silver, Gold and Diamond, and enjoy seat upgrades, business and first‑class lounge access, and travel perks across Cathay Pacific and Oneworld partners.

sections.title: Program essentials
sections.intro: Key facts to get started with Cathay membership.

items.label: Earn currency
items.value: Asia Miles (reward currency) & Status Points (status metric)

items.label: Earning basis
items.value: Asia Miles earned based on fare class, distance and cabin on Cathay Pacific, Oneworld and partner flights; Status Points earned on flights

blocks.text: Cathay membership allows you to earn Asia Miles on flights with Cathay Pacific, Oneworld airlines and selected partners, as well as through hotel stays, dining, shopping and co‑branded credit cards. Asia Miles can be redeemed for award flights, upgrades, extra‑legroom seats and a host of lifestyle rewards. Status Points determine your tier and are earned on flights based on airline, cabin and fare.

blocks.title: Ways to earn Asia Miles & Status Points
items: Paid flights operated by Cathay Pacific, Oneworld carriers and selected partners (earn Asia Miles and Status Points).
Spending on hotels, car rentals, dining and shopping with Asia Miles partners (earn Asia Miles).
Promotions, purchase or transfer of Asia Miles and partner credit card offers.

blocks.text: Status levels are achieved by earning Status Points within a membership year: Silver requires 300 Status Points, Gold 600 and Diamond 1,200. Mid‑status benefits unlock additional lounge passes and upgrade certificates at various thresholds (e.g., 200, 450, 800, 1,000, 1,400 and 1,600 points).

Asia Miles follow an activity‑based expiry system: earning or redeeming at least one mile every 18 months keeps your miles active. Status Points reset at the end of each membership year and cannot be extended or purchased.

sections.title: Cathay tier breakdown
sections.intro: Four tiers unlock progressively greater seat privileges, lounge access, baggage allowances and guaranteed seats.

table.caption: Cathay membership tiers at a glance

cells: Green (Entry)
Automatic on enrolment
Base Asia Miles earn rate; no mileage bonus

Priority online check‑in up to 48 h before departure· Redeem Asia Miles for extra‑legroom seats and extra baggage· Access to exclusive flight offers and 24‑hour free cancellation within 24 h of booking (conditions apply)· Two‑day PressReader access on every trip
Silver
300 Status Points within a membership year
300 Status Points each membership year
Base Asia Miles earn rate; no mileage bonus

Business Class check‑in and priority boarding· Priority baggage handling and preferred seating · Complimentary access to Cathay Pacific and Air New Zealand Business Class lounges when flying Cathay Pacific (no guest)· Mid‑status benefit at 450 Status Points: two additional lounge passes
Gold
600 Status Points within a membership year
600 Status Points each membership year
Base Asia Miles earn rate; no mileage bonus

All Silver benefits · Guaranteed Economy Class seat on Cathay Pacific flights · One extra checked bag and 10 kg more cabin allowance · Business Class lounge access for the member and one guest · Mid‑status benefits at 800 and 1,000 Status Points (additional lounge passes and one‑way upgrade certificates) · Partner perks such as hotel upgrades and car rental discounts
Diamond
1,200 Status Points within a membership year
1,200 Status Points each membership year
Base Asia Miles earn rate; no mileage bonus

All Gold benefits · First Class check‑in and boarding · First Class lounge access for the member and two guests· Guaranteed Premium Economy and Business Class seats on Cathay Pacific flights · Extra checked baggage allowance and heavier cabin baggage · Mid‑status benefits at 1,400 and 1,600 Status Points including lounge passes and bookable upgrades

sections.title: Discounts & perks
sections.intro: Cathay membership tiers unlock a range of travel and lifestyle benefits.
bullets: Seat privileges: Silver members receive preferred seat selection; Gold and Diamond members enjoy guaranteed seats (Economy for Gold, Premium Economy and Business for Diamond) on Cathay Pacific flights.
Lounge access: Silver members access business lounges when flying Cathay Pacific; Gold members can invite one guest; Diamond members access first‑class lounges with two guests.
Priority services: Silver, Gold and Diamond members benefit from priority check‑in, boarding and baggage handling, as well as dedicated service hotlines and priority stand‑by.
Extra baggage: Each tier from Silver upwards includes heavier checked and cabin baggage allowances and priority baggage delivery.
Mid‑status rewards: At 450, 800, 1,000, 1,400 and 1,600 Status Points you receive lounge passes and bookable one‑way upgrade certificates.
Partner perks: Gold and Diamond members enjoy room upgrades and dining discounts at partner hotels, and car rental upgrades and discounts through Hertz and other partners.

blocks.text: Cathay rewards you with additional perks as you earn more Status Points.

items: Green members unlock one Business Class lounge pass at 200 Status Points, which can be used by the member or a companion.
Silver members receive two lounge passes at 450 Status Points; Gold and Diamond members earn extra lounge passes and one‑way upgrade certificates at 800, 1,000, 1,400 and 1,600 points respectively.

Lounge passes must be claimed online before travel and are valid for one year. One‑way upgrade certificates can be redeemed for a confirmed upgrade on eligible Cathay Pacific flights, subject to availability.
Members can purchase additional lounge access or redeem Asia Miles for extra legroom seats, extra baggage or flight upgrades when award space is available.

awardPlaybook.title: Search partners, not airlines
awardPlaybook.detail: Use Air Canada Aeroplan, Avianca LifeMiles, or Virgin Atlantic to book seats on Star Alliance and SkyTeam partners with fewer surcharges.

awardPlaybook.title: Leverage stopovers
awardPlaybook.detail: Programs like Aeroplan and Alaska Mileage Plan allow stopovers on one-way awards—turn a connection into a mini vacation.

awardPlaybook.title: Watch transfer bonuses
awardPlaybook.detail: Watchout for transfer bonused between Loyalty programs. Transfer only when a specific award is available.

favoriteRoutes.highlight: Redeem 10k points + taxes for one-way flight to London during off-peak dates. Sometimes the reward flight is available for as low as 6.5k points
Book Cathay Pacific flight from India to Hong Kong for 12500 Avios + taxes.
Short-haul flights start at 4k points and avoid high fuel surcharges when booked through Iberia.
